price: 4. En diegenen waarschuwen die zeggen: “Allah heeft een zoon genomen.”
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
